attributes.doc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: {{ service_name }}-config
data:
  {{ config_data }}

apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: {{ service_name }}-secret
type: Opaque
{"flags": {"{{ flag_name }}": {"enabled": {{ enabled }}, "rollout_percentage": {{ rollout }}}}}
{"queue_url": "{{ queue_url }}", "visibility_timeout": {{ visibility_timeout }}, "max_receive_count": {{ max_receive_count }}}
{"topic_arn": "{{ topic_arn }}", "protocol": "{{ protocol }}"}
{"bucket": "{{ bucket_name }}", "region": "{{ region }}", "prefix": "{{ prefix }}"}
{"table_name": "{{ table_name }}", "region": "{{ region }}", "read_capacity": {{ read_capacity }}, "write_capacity": {{ write_capacity }}}
{"cluster_endpoint": "{{ endpoint }}", "port": {{ port }}, "auth_token_enabled": {{ auth_enabled }}}
{"endpoint": "{{ endpoint }}", "port": {{ port }}, "database": "{{ database }}", "ssl_mode": "{{ ssl_mode }}"}
{"endpoint": "{{ endpoint }}", "index_prefix": "{{ index_prefix }}"}
{"stream_name": "{{ stream_name }}", "shard_count": {{ shard_count }}, "region": "{{ region }}"}
